Brian, this may be result of changes in the navigator framework that we missed when we integrated with the latest milestone.  I'm guessing our extension just needs to implement a different interface.  Thanks, Rob.

Delivered fixes today for the SQL model sorter (needed to implement ViewerSorter, which was why it was throwing the ClassCastException). Also added a generic sorter to the DSE so categories & profiles are sorted again. Should appear in tonight's nightly build.
